name: Aquanta
0:
”Alexa, ask Aquanta to boost”
”Alexa, turn on away”
”Alexa, ask Aquanta if boost is running”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aquanta
des:
With the Aquanta skill for Amazon Alexa, you can control your Aquanta via voice commands and smart home routines.

To get started, please follow the below steps:
1. Setup your Aquanta account and pair to your Aquanta device by using the Aquanta App.
2. In the Devices section of the Alexa app, tap the “+” button at the top to add a new device.
3. Scroll down to and tap on the Water Heater category. Follow the instructions to enable the skill and link your Aquanta account with your Alexa account.
4. Your paired Aquanta devices should appear in the Alexa app alongside your other smart home devices.


After you've enabled the skill, just say:
"Alexa, tell Aquanta to boost"
"Alexa, ask Aquanta to boost for 1 day" (or any duration of your choosing)
"Alexa, tell Aquanta to stop boosting"
"Alexa, turn on away on (device name)"
"Alexa, turn off away"

As a smart home skill Aquanta can also hook into routines, allowing you to coordinate Aquanta with the rest of your smart home devices.
